snippet.title: Let’s Play Rise of the Wool Ball #01: Introduction
snippet.description:
Time has passed. The invasion of the evil space cats is but a distant memory, their factories and bunkers reclaimed by nature. For the people of the world, normality has returned to their lives including Scott and his girlfriend Rebecca. With the end of winter, they awake from hibernation to do what they love; taking walks through the countryside and attending metal festivals. For them, everything is as it should be…

...Or so they think.

A lot can happen while you’re hibernating and, against all the odds, evil can survive the impossible. Evil tends to hold a grudge as well and little do Scott and Rebecca know that things are about to get worse than they’ve ever been for them. With the world – or rather, what’s left of it – hanging in the balance and Scott captured by the leader of the evil space cats who amazingly isn’t dead, it’s up to Rebecca to put a stop to the ambitions of their feline foes once and for all.

Chainguns at the ready folks, for once more we delve into a prickly situation.

Rise of the Wool Ball can be downloaded from here and requires ZDoom to function. Further information can be found in the link provided.
https://www.moddb.com/mods/rise-of-the-wool-ball-v13

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Kikoskia
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/kikoskia
Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/X2YUmPh
